value:
I imagine Tormod could appreciate
playing pirate more than I do...

Being ignored or hated without any
reason is no way to live... I want for
all to feel included in this festival.

Was this pirate garb selected
to match my wings?

If Muarim or Tormod ever arrive,
please let me know. Of course, I'm
perfectly fine alone, it's just...

As long as no one gets hurt, playing
the character of a pirate should be
a delight.

I come bearing an invitation to the
pirate festival. Please come enjoy
the festivities if you're interested.

If I'm this successful at piracy,
I suppose I ought not to complain.

Treasure is to be taken when you
are a pirate.
I am struggling against this wind...

You're just handing this treasure
over to me? ...I must temper my
expectations, or I will grow spoiled.

Ah... Have you been there long?$k$pI wasn't daydreaming... I was
watching the people participate
in the festival.$k$pAskr is such a wonderful place...
Laguz, beorc, and so many others
are all celebrating together.$k$pI believe the goal of the Laguz
Emancipation Army might just
be to create a country like Askr.$k$pAnyway... While the festival lasts,
I'm going to go look for treasure.$k$pAnd then, when I return to Tellius,
I'll tell Tormod of what I saw here to
share the treasure of this experience.
たあっ
止める…
ああっ…
なんで…
Mine now.
Where's the treasure?
Wind's against you.
Don't value your life?
Boss...forgive me...
Sigh...
I'm not sure I like being called a pirate... I'm more of a freedom fighter.
You sure do like to goof around.
All the excitement around the festival is a little overwhelming...
Hmm... Do you think my black wings make my "pirate look" too sinister?
My personal treasure is a figurine of the goddess. Just holding it makes me feel more optimistic.
Laguz and beorc, all smiling together... This is a sight I'm happy to have seen...
For you, I don't mind being a pirate.
Aye.
Uhh...huh.
Swooping in.
